email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you provide a rate estimate and vessel availability for this shipment? Ideally, we are targeting a laycan of October 10-15.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, which is currently in Antwerp and can be repositioned to Rotterdam for your laycan. The starting freight rate is USD 65 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 65 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 60 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the loading window in Rotterdam is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 60 per metric tonne is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the MV OCEAN TRADER with the laycan of October 10-15. Kindly send over the contract details at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for confirming the booking. I have attached the contract details for your review. Please sign and return the contract to finalize the booking. The vessel will be ready for loading in Rotterdam as per the agreed laycan.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
